name: Pongs Squad - Metal Man
description:
Pongs Squad is a group of criminals from an unknown country. They are scattered in various parts of the world due to a dispute between their captain and vice-captain.

Dafi Nafaz is the captain of the group. He was nicknamed metal man because he had been tested and failed by a mad professor in his country, so that his blood was mixed with metal molecules which caused his whole body to become metal. Currently, he is hiding somewhere in Senegal.
